title: 128. Niqui McCown and Tina Marie Ivery
description:
On this episode of MWMH, Payton and Garrett discuss the disappearance and murder of Niqui McCown and Tina Marie Ivery.

Case Sources:
https://www.richmondindiana.gov/resources/interesting-facts
